participant_1.background:
I live far from my family, but I love them.
I enjoy creating and sharing art with others to help them learn about animal welfare issues.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
i drive an suv.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.
I enjoy listening to Nightwish to remind myself that I can accomplish anything if I set my mind to it.
I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once.
i work in marketing , and i love it.
I maintained a healthy weight last year.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
I'm a marketing manager. What do you do?
I create art to help people learn about animal welfare issues.
That sounds really cool! What kind of art do you make?
I mostly draw and paint animals. I also make sculptures out of recycled materials.
That's amazing! I love art. I used to be a musician, but now I work in marketing.
That's cool! I love music too. What kind of music did you play?
I played the guitar and sang. I was in a band for a while.
That's awesome! I used to play the piano and sing, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
Yeah, it's hard to find time for everything.
What do you like most about your job?
I like working with people and coming up with creative ideas.
Me too! I love working with people and using my creativity to help animals.
That's great! I'm glad you found a job that you love.
Thanks! I am too. It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I bet it is. I'm sure you're making a difference in the world.
